import React from 'react' import { secondsToDuration, minutesToDuration } from "../utils/duration"; function ProgressBar({session, focusDuration, }) { return ( session &&
{/** TODO: Update message below to include current session (Focusing or On Break) total duration */}

{session?.label} for {(focusDuration).toLocaleString('en-US', {minimumIntegerDigits: 2, useGrouping:false})}:00 minutes

{/* TODO: Update message below correctly format the time remaining in the current session */}

{secondsToDuration(session?.timeRemaining)} remaining

) } export default ProgressBar
